kw.name: Login And Redirect
kw.msg: Logging in using acalimag and kjt

kw.name: Get Dispute Details Db
kw.doc: TODO: Create a database query to retrieve the dispute details
kw.msg: Executing query. SELECT u.username, u.name, ud.status, ud.udid, ud.requestedstarttime, ud.requestedendtime, ud.currentstarttime, ud.currentendtime, ud.workhours, ud.reason, ud.createTime, ul.location, ut.name as Team, ud.currentactivitycode, ud.requestedactivitycode, ud.payhours, ud.reviewcomment, ud.internalnotes, ud.reviewedby, ud.reviewtime, ud.confirmtime FROM kjt.usermeta AS um JOIN kjt.user AS u ON um.uid = u.uid JOIN kjt.userlocation AS ul ON um.lid = ul.lid JOIN kjt.userteam AS ut ON um.teamId = ut.utid JOIN wfm.userdispute AS ud ON u.username = ud.username where ud.udid = %s;

${res_dis} = {'Full Name': 'TQA4 (tqa4)', 'Status': 'Approved', 'Current Time Range': 'Jun 05, 2023 5:00 PM - Jun 05, 2023 10:00 PM', 'Requested Time Range': 'Jun 05, 2023 4:00 PM - Jun 05, 2023 11:00 PM', 'Work H...

kw.name: Get User Details
kw.doc: TODO: Create a database query to retrieve the Agent's UID.
kw.msg: Using an existing connection <mysql.connector.connection_cext.CMySQLConnection object at 0x000002171B0288E0>.

Executing query. SELECT u.username, um.position, ul.code, ul.location, um.workforceid, ut.name as team FROM kjt.usermeta AS um JOIN kjt.user AS u ON um.uid = u.uid JOIN kjt.userlocation AS ul ON um.lid = ul.lid JOIN kjt.userteam AS ut ON um.teamId = ut.utid WHERE u.username = %s;
